name: tm44
effect: Teaches Rest to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Rest to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.black_white: The user goes to sleep for two turns. It fully restores the user’s HP and heals any status problem.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user goes to sleep for two turns. It fully restores the user’s HP and heals any status problem.
